patterns: I had a breakup with my boyfriend

responses: Oh my dear, I know breakup sucks but I want to tell you that I am here for you.

patterns: My family has put too much pressure on me
responses: A happy family is but an earlier heaven. I understand that you are very anxious right now.
Memories are the sweetest poison. So, think about all the happy memories with your family.
